name: Treasure hunt (Rashmita Chatterjee)
description:
There are 9 runs in each gameplay. A treasure chest will be hidden in one of the 10 rooms in the game environment. The path will be first shown in a guided manner to the player and then the player needs to find their way to the treasure chest.

You need a gaming console like an Xbox controller to play the game. The right thumbstick is for translation and the left thumbstick is for rotation.
